se.lth.cs.docforia.io.file

Class DocumentFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lth.cs.docforia.io.file.DocumentFileWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentWriter

    public class DocumentFileWriter
extends Object
implements DocumentWriter
    Thread-safe sequential document storage writer
    See Also:
    DocumentFileReader
